name: GoodSleepSounds
0:
”Alexa, open good sleep sounds”
”Alexa, start good sleep sounds”
”Alexa, begin good sleep sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good sleep sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Let soothing nature sounds and synthesizers carry you away to deep sleep. Enjoy these gentle, relaxing sounds that combine the sounds of nature with synthesizer melodies.

HOW TO USE:

To Get Started: Say, “Alexa, start Good Sleep Sounds.”

When a sound is playing, you can say "Alexa Next" or Alexa Previous" to play the next or previous sound.

To stop playing, you can say "Alexa, Stop".

The following nature sounds are available for free.

"Rain", "Waves", "Distant Thunder", "Insects", "Wind", "Sand Dunes", "Ocean", "Lake", "Forest", "Creek", "River", "Countryside", "Bamboo Forest", "Tropical Island", "Howling Wind", "Breeze", "Murmuring Stream", "Spring Water", "Wilderness", "Waterfall", "Jungle", "Small Birds", "Birds", "Thunder", "Crows", "Cicadas", "Frogs", "Owls", "Storm", "Limestone Cave", "Raindrops", "Squall", "Evening Shower", "Bonfire", “Faerie Waves”, “Refreshing Forest”, and “Goodnight Owls”

To start a sound directly (when Sleep Sounds is already playing a sound -OR- when Sleep Sounds is not started ): Say "Alexa, tell Good Sleep Sounds to play Waves". Replace "Waves" with any supported sound name.

Premium Option

By enabling the premium option, you can combine the nature sounds with the following synthesizer melodies, creating a total of 1,154 combinations for you to enjoy.

"Jet Black", "Illusion", "Sleep", "Comfortable Sleep", "Dream", "Morning", "Daytime", "Night", "Stars", "Constellations", "Moon", "Crescent moon", "Full Moon", "Meditation", "Light", "Refresh", "Twilight", "Morning Glow", "Mystery", "Faeries", "Green", "Truth", "Golden", "Healing", "Silence", "Forest Bath", "Memory", "Relax", "Goodnight", "Guidance", "Awareness", "Recovery"

* When using the free version, the synthesizer melodies can be played on their own without being combined with nature sounds.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
